wikipedia_page.main: General Sir Robert George Victor FitzGeorge-Balfour  (15 September 1913 – 28 December 1994) was a General officer in the British Army.

* Mabel Iris FitzGeorge (1886–1976), who married Robert Balfour in 1912 and had issue (including Victor FitzGeorge-Balfour). She married secondly, to Vladimir Emmanuelovich, Prince Galitzin, in 1945.

*1. Mabel Iris FitzGeorge (23 September 1886 – 13 April 1976) married in 1912 to Robert Balfour, had issue (Victor FitzGeorge-Balfour). Married secondly, in 1945 to Vladimir Emmanuelovich, Prince Galitzin, no issue.

response: In 1911, Christian married Geraldine Diana Monsell. Together they had one son and two daughters. One of his daughters, Mary Diana Christian, was married to General Victor FitzGeorge-Balfour.
* Major-General Robert George Victor FitzGeorge-Balfour,  (53288), late Foot Guards.

link_mentions.page: Vice Chief of the General Staff (United Kingdom)

response: In November 1913, the brothers were named as godparents (along with their cousin Queen Mary) to their great-nephew Victor FitzGeorge-Balfour, and attended his christening at Savoy Chapel. FitzGeorge-Balfour was the son of FitzGeorge's niece, Mabel Iris FitzGeorge and her husband Robert Shekelton Balfour.
